content: pam s ombre cowled neckwarmer october 2019 photo1 pattern has not yet been rated for skill level design uses the following stitches and stitch patterns chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet primrose pattern and a modified cluster / fan stitch the design is worked in row and in rounds as noted yarn gelatos my motto yarn bee sugarwheel yarn green ombre 4 ply medium yarn 7 oz 355 yards crochet hook h or size to meet gauge gauge 8 row = 4 high & 18 sts = 4 wide approximately special stitch instructions primrose pattern worked in multiples of 3 with plus 1 st added to the end of the chain row 1 1 single_crochet ch2 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook *skip 2 sts 1 single_crochet ch2 1 single_crochet in next st repeat from the * all across skip 1 st 1 half_double_crochet in next st turn your work row 2 ch3 *3 double_crochet in next ch2 space repeat from the * all across 1 double_crochet in turning chain turn your work row 3 ch2 skip 1 st 1 single_crochet ch2 1 single_crochet in next st *skip 2 sts 1 single_crochet ch2 1 single_crochet in next st repeat from the * all across 1 half_double_crochet in turning chain turn your work repeat row 2 3 until you reach your desired length 5 for the cowl pattern end with row 2 as your final row below modified fan stitch 2 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in next single_crochet cowl start chain 107 106+1 row 1 do not allow chain to twist single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook * single_crochet in next chain * repeat to last chain ch2 turn row 2 primrose pattern * single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet *repeat end on next to last st 1hdc in last single_crochet turn row 3 ch3 * 3dc in next ch2 space *repeat end last st 1dc in top of chain turn row 4 notice that in this row skip 2 double_crochet means work will be in the middle double_crochet of each group of 3 dcs across the row ch2 working in 2nd double_crochet single_crochet ch2 single_crochet skip 2 double_crochet * single_crochet ch2 single_crochet skip 2 double_crochet * repeat end with 1hdc in top of chain turn row 5 - 11 repeat row 3 & 4 until piece measures 5 high end with row 4 turn work in rounds from this point in project until completed round 1 edge preparation to be completed on all 4 sides of rectangular piece in this round prior to shaping step ch1 single_crochet in half_double_crochet * single_crochet in next single_crochet 1sc in ch2 space single_crochet in next single_crochet * repeat to end 2sc to complete the corner on 1st short side & on each corner piece throughout on each short side make 18 single_crochet across short ends evenly spaced 2 single_crochet to shape corner on opposite long side using the remaining loop of each chain 1sc to end of round slip_stitch in top of
